title: Applications / Packages
description: A schema for defining applications or packages to install on Windows machine.

package_source.description: The source (command line) to get package from

auto_install.description: Whether or not automatically install `winget` cli and install packages from the list if it is not found.

packages.description: List of winget packages' IDs to install.

choco.description: Install applications using `choco` cli: To add programs for developers which will be available for all users

auto_install.description: Whether or not automatically install `choco` cli and install packages from the list if it is not found.

packages.description: List of choco packages' names to install.

scoop.description: Install applications using `scoop` cli: To add packages which installed for current user.

auto_install.description: Whether or not automatically install `scoop` cli and install packages from the list if it is not found.

packages.description: List of scoop packages' names to install.

buckets.description: List of scoop buckets to add.

invoke_command.description: Command to invoke to install an addon

check_command.description: Command to if an addon is installed or not

install.description: Whether or not to install provided plugins/extensions for application in the list
Whether or not to install powershell modules in provided list
